creator.description: Moderation service for identifying posts and media with user-hostile accessibility properties. Managed by @baatl.bsky.social.

locales.description: Media posted with alt text describing it in a way that can't be understood without access to the media, such as captions that assume the reader can see the image.
locales.name: Misused Alt Text

locales.description: Exploitation of Unicode text characters for a purely-graphical effect, which inhibits the text's readability outside of visual contexts (such as translation, or when read aloud by text-to-speech software).
locales.name: Unicode Abuse

locales.description: Media posted with alt text that conveys effectively nothing at all (such as just the words "alt text").
locales.name: Meaningless Alt Text

locales.description: Media posted without any alt text provided.
locales.name: No Alt Text
